name: Apigateway-lambda
body:
1. Install Slack
1. Join the 'sdawsmagicnight' Slack channel
1. Create a GitHub Web Hook for Pull Requests using API Gateway and Lambda.
    1. https://developer.github.com/webhooks/creating/
1. Send a message to the Slack Channel when a PR has been ***opened***.
    1. Include Team Name
    1. Use a unique Team Icon.
1. Create a Slack Command to close the open PR using API Gateway and Lambda (Bonus)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
